entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`ski_resort_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `user_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ski_resort_name` TEXT, `favorite` INTEGER NOT NULL, `seven_day_forecast` TEXT, `temp` REAL NOT NULL, `wind_dir` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wind_spd` INTEGER NOT NULL, `cloud_cover` INTEGER NOT NULL, `vis` INTEGER NOT NULL, `rel_humid` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`user_id`) REFERENCES `User`(`user_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`user_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `oauth_key` TEXT, `username` TEXT, `ski_resort` INTEGER NOT NULL, `postal_code` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_User_oauth_key
